{{VO/Story
|character           = Jean

|name                = 진

|vo_01_01_title      = 첫 만남…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 「민들레 기사」 진, 가입을 신청합니다. 앞으로 제 명예와 충성심은 당신과 함께할 것입니다!
|vo_01_01_rm         = "Mindeulle Gisa" Jin, gaibeul sincheonghapnida. Apeuro je myeong'yewa chungseongsimeun dangsingwa hamkkehal geosipnida!
|vo_01_01_tl         = "Dandelion Knight" Jean, asking to join. From now, my honor and loyalty will be with you!

|vo_02_01_title      = 잡담・작전
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Operation
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Operation.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = 어서 움직여, 계속 이곳에 머물 순 없어
|vo_02_01_rm         = Eoseo umjigyeo, gyesok igose meomul sun eopsseo
|vo_02_01_tl         = Come on, move, we can't stay here.

|vo_02_02_title      = 잡담・기사단
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Knights of Favonius
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Knights of Favonius.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = 기사단의 모두들… 열심히 일하고 있으려나
|vo_02_02_rm         = Gisadan-ui modudeul... yeolsimhi ilhago isseuryeona
|vo_02_02_tl         = Everyone in the Knights... will they be working hard.

|vo_02_03_title      = 잡담・목표
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Target
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Target.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = 가자, 다음 목표로!
|vo_02_03_rm         = Gaja, daeum mokpyoro!
|vo_02_03_tl         = Let's go, to the next goal!

|vo_03_01_title      = 비가 올 때…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = 비도 나의 걸음을 막을 순 없어
|vo_03_01_rm         = Bido na-ui georeumeul mageul sun eopsseo
|vo_03_01_tl         = Rain cannot stop me walking.

|vo_03_02_title      = 비가 그친 후…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = After the Rain
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} After the Rain.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = 이런 날씨는 움직이기 딱이지
|vo_03_02_rm         = Ireon nalssineun umjigigi ttagiji
|vo_03_02_tl         = This kind of weather is best to move around.

|vo_03_03_title      = 눈이 올 때…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When It Snows
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 눈이 오네. 부츠 관리에 신경 써야겠어
|vo_03_03_rm         = Nuni one. Bucheu gwanrie singyeong sseoyagesseo
|vo_03_03_tl         = It's snowing. I should take care of my boots.

|vo_03_04_title      = 바람이 불 때…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When It's Windy
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It's Windy.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = 정말 상쾌한 날씨네
|vo_03_04_rm         = Jeongmal sangkwaehan nalssine
|vo_03_04_tl         = It's a really refreshing weather.

|vo_03_05_title      = 강풍이 불 때…
|vo_03_05_subtitle   = When the Wind Is Blowing
|vo_03_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Wind Is Blowing.ogg
|vo_03_05_tx         = 듣자하니, 그날도 드물게 바람이 엄청나게 불었다던데…
|vo_03_05_rm         = Deutjahani, geunaldo deumulge barami eomcheongnage bureotdadeonde...
|vo_03_05_tl         = Apparently, it was rarely very windy that day as well...

|vo_04_01_title      = 아침 인사…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = 「하루의 계획은 아침에」라는 말이 있잖아. 오늘도 화이팅!
|vo_04_01_rm         = "Haru-ui gyehoegeun achime"raneun mari itjana. Oneuldo hwaiting!
|vo_04_01_tl         = There's a saying, "The plan of the day is in the morning." Go today, too!

|vo_04_02_title      = 점심 인사…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = 좋아, 그럼 지금부터 임무를 처리하자고
|vo_04_02_rm         = Joa, geureom jigeumbuteo immureul cheorihajago
|vo_04_02_tl         = Good, then let's handle the missions from now.

|vo_04_03_title      = 저녁 인사…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = 커피에 면역이 생긴 듯하네. 대체할 만한 게 있는지… 리사에게 물어봐야겠어
|vo_04_03_rm         = Keopie myeonyeogi saenggin deuthane. Daechehal manhan ge itneunji... Risaege mureobwayagesseo
|vo_04_03_tl         = Looks like I became immune to coffee. I need to ask Lisa... if there is a replacement.

|vo_04_04_title      = 굿나잇…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = 오늘의 수련은 여기까지. 멋지던데, 수고했어
|vo_04_04_rm         = Oneurui suryeoneun yeogikkaji. Meotjideonde, sugohaesseo
|vo_04_04_tl         = That's all for today's training. That was cool, good job.

|vo_05_01_title      = 진 자신에 대해…
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character}.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = 오늘 사람들을 지키려다 보니, 유적 가디언을 5기나 산산조각 내버렸어. 휴, 난 아직 멀었나 봐…그 귀한 문화유산을…다음엔 맨손으로 쓰러뜨려 봐야겠어
|vo_05_01_rm         = Oneul saramdeureul jikiryeoda boni, yujeok gadieoneul daseotgina sansanjogak naebeoryeosseo. Hyu, nan ajik meoreotna bwa... geu gwihan munhwayusaneul... daeumen maensoneuro sseureotteuryeo bwayagesseo
|vo_05_01_tl         = Trying to protect people today, I've shattered five ruin guards. Phew, I guess I'm still a long way off... that precious cultural heritage... next time, I'll try to knock it down with my bare hands.

|vo_06_01_title      = 우리에 대해・신조
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Creed
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Creed.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = 전력으로 도울게, 물론 정의에 어긋나는 방향으로 간다면 쓴소리를 아끼지 않을 거야
|vo_06_01_rm         = Jeonryeogeuro doulge, mullon jeong'uie eogeutnaneun banghyang'euro gandamyeon sseunsorireul akkiji aneul geoya
|vo_06_01_tl         = I'll do my best to help you, and of course I'll not spare the hard truth if you go against justice.

|vo_06_02_title      = 우리에 대해・맹세
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Oath
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Oath.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 이 검을 걸고 맹세하지, 반드시 당신에게 승리를 바치겠어
|vo_06_02_rm         = I geomeul geolgo maengsehaji, bandeusi dangsinege seungrireul bachigesseo
|vo_06_02_tl         = I swear on this sword, I'll give you victory.

|vo_06_03_title      = 우리에 대해・임무
|vo_06_03_subtitle   = About Us: Quest
|vo_06_03_friendship = 6
|vo_06_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Quest.ogg
|vo_06_03_tx         = 임무는 자동으로 완료되지 않아. 하지만 적당히 쉬는 것도 괜찮겠지, 오늘 점심은 특별히 단 몇 분이라도 쉬어야겠어
|vo_06_03_rm         = Immuneun jadong'euro wanryodoeji ana. Hajiman jeokdanghi swineun geotdo gwaenchanketjji, oneul jeomsimeun teukbyeolhi dan myeot bunirado swieoyagesseo
|vo_06_03_tl         = The mission does not complete automatically. But it's okay to rest sometimes, I should especially rest for a few minutes at lunch today.

|vo_07_01_title      = 「신의 눈」에 대해…
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the Vision
|vo_07_01_friendship = 4
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 「평생 몬드를 수호하라」 군힐드 가문의 가훈이야. 「신의 눈」을 사용할 때마다 어머니, 그리고 몬드 시민들의 기대감이 떠올라. 난 몬드를 위해, 그리고 자유를 위해 싸우는 걸 마다하지 않을 거야
|vo_07_01_rm         = "Pyeongsaeng Mondeureul suhohara" Gunhildeu gamun-ui gahuniya. "Sin-ui Nun"eul sayonghal ttaemada eomoni, geurigo Mondeu simindeul-ui gidaegami tteoolla. Nan Mondeureul wihae, geurigo jayureul wihae ssauneun geol madahaji aneul geoya
|vo_07_01_tl         = "Protect Mondstadt for your life", it's the family motto of the Gunnhildr Clan. Whenever I use my "Vision", I think of the expectations of my mother and the citizens of Mondstadt. I won't hesitate to fight for Mondstadt, and freedom.

|vo_07_02_title      = 하고 싶은 이야기…
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 페보니우스 기사단을 대표해 몬드를 구해준 당신에게 감사 인사를 할게, 그리고 적당히 휴식을 취해서 힘을… 왜그래? 왜 갑자기 웃는 거지? 내가 뭐 이상한 말이라도 했어?
|vo_07_02_rm         = Peboniuseu gisadaneul daepyohae Mondeureul guhaejun dangsinege gamsa insareul halge, geurigo jeokdanghi hyusigeul chwihaeseo himeul... wae geurae? Wae gapjagi utneun geoji? Naega mwo isanghan marirado haesseo?
|vo_07_02_tl         = On behalf of the Knights of Favonius, I would like to thank you for saving Mondstadt, and take a proper rest to strengthen... What's wrong? Why are you laughing all of a sudden? Did I say something weird?

|vo_07_03_title      = 흥미있는 일…
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = 「민들레야, 민들레야 바람과 함께 먼 곳으로 떠나가렴」…민들레는 바람을 타고 셀레스티아까지 갈지도 모르겠군
|vo_07_03_rm         = "Mindeulleya, mindeulleya baramgwa hamkke meon goseuro tteonagaryeom"... Mindeulleneun barameul tago selleseutiakkaji galjido moreugetgun
|vo_07_03_tl         = "Dandelion, dandelion, float towards somewhere faraway with the wind"... maybe the dandelion might go to Celestia with the wind.

|vo_08_01_title      = 바바라에 대해…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Barbara]]
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Barbara.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 바바라는 노력파지만 때론 너무 자신을 몰아붙여…응? 왜 그렇게 잘 아냐고? 페보니우스 성당도 기사단 관할이거든
|vo_08_01_rm         = Babaraneun noryeokpajiman ttaeron neomu jasineul morabuchyeo... eung? Wae geureoke jal anyago? Peboniuseu seongdangdo gisadan gwanharigeodeun
|vo_08_01_tl         = Barbara is a hard worker, but sometimes she pushes herself too hard... Huh? Why do I know so well? The Favonius Cathedral is also under the jurisdiction of the Knights.

|vo_08_02_title      = 리사에 대해…
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Lisa]]
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lisa.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 리사가 있다면 많이 안심 되지
|vo_08_02_rm         = Risaga itdamyeon mani anim doeji
|vo_08_02_tl         = I'm relieved if Lisa is here.

|vo_08_03_title      = 엠버에 대해…
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Amber]]
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Amber.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 엠버는 요새 확실히 성장했어. 언젠가 그녀의 무용담도 음유시인의 시로 널리 퍼지면 좋겠네
|vo_08_03_rm         = Embeoneun yosae hwaksilhi seongjanghaesseo. Eonjenga geunyeo-ui muyongdamdo eumyusiin-ui siro neolli peojimyeon jokenne
|vo_08_03_tl         = Amber has certainly grown up these days. I hope one day her stories will spread by bards' poetry.

|vo_08_04_title      = 케이아에 대해…
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Kaeya]]
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kaeya.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 그래…? 케이아도 당신에게 건의했나 보군, 케이아는 훌륭한 페보니우스 기사야. 그건 확실해
|vo_08_04_rm         = Geurae...? Keiado dangsinege geonuihaetna bogun, Keianeun hullyunghan Peboniuseu gisaya. Geugeon hwaksilhae
|vo_08_04_tl         = Really...? Kaeya must have suggested to you as well, Kaeya is an excellent Knight of Favonius. That's certain for sure.

|vo_08_05_title      = 클레에 대해…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Klee]]
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Klee.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = 노는 게 아이의 천성이라고 생각하지만 클레가 마음에 들어 하는 장난감들은 모두 위험한 것들이어서 안심이 안 돼
|vo_08_05_rm         = Noneun ge aiui cheonseong'irago saenggakhajiman Keullega maeume deureo haneun jangnangamdeureun modu wiheomhan geotdeurieoseo ansimi an dwae
|vo_08_05_tl         = I think it's a child's nature to play, but I'm not relieved because all the toys Klee likes are dangerous.

|vo_08_06_title      = 알베도에 대해…
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Albedo]]
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Albedo.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 「천재」라는 말은 알베도 같은 사람을 위해 만들어진 것이 아닐까?
|vo_08_06_rm         = "Cheonjae"raneun mareun Albedo gateun sarameul wihae mandeureojin geosi anilkka?
|vo_08_06_tl         = The word "Genius" must be made for a person like Albedo, isn't it?

|vo_08_07_title      = 바르카에 대해…
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Varka]]
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Varka.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = 바르카 대단장님은 페보니우스 기사단의 전설이야. 대단장님이 승리하여 돌아오는 날 직접 이야기를 나눠봐. 수확이 많을 거야
|vo_08_07_rm         = Bareuka daedanjangnimeun Peboniuseu gisadan-ui jeonseoriya. Daedanjangnim-i seungrihayeo doraoneun nal jikjeop iyagireul nanwobwa. Suhwagi maneul geoya
|vo_08_07_tl         = Grandmaster Varka is the legend of the Knights of Favonius. When the day of the Grandmaster returning with victory comes, talk with him by yourself. You'll earn many things.

|vo_08_08_title      = 노엘에 대해…
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Noelle]]
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Noelle.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 노엘, 음… 페보니우스 기사단의 기사가 되려고 애쓰는 소녀. 그녀의 내면은 여전히 나약해. 지금 이 단계에서는 험악한 바깥세상과 접촉하지 않는 게 좋을지도 몰라
|vo_08_08_rm         = Noel, eum... Peboniuseu gisadan-ui gisaga doeryeogo aesseuneun sonyeo. Geunyeo-ui naemyeoneun yeojeonhi nayakhae. Jigeum i dangyeeseoneun heomakhan bakkatsesanggwa jeopchokhaji anneun ge joeuljido molla
|vo_08_08_tl         = Noelle, hmm... a girl trying to be a Knight of Favonius. She's still weak inside. Maybe it's better not to come in contact the ugly outside world at this stage.

|vo_08_09_title      = 로자리아에 대해…
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Rosaria]]
|vo_08_09_friendship = 4
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Rosaria.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = 로자리아 수녀는 늘 귀찮다는 말을 입에 달고 살지만, 업무에 충실해. 지난번에 내가 귀찮으면 내게 도움을 청하라 라고 하자 그게 더 귀찮다고 대답했어. 음… 역시 난 아직 부족해
|vo_08_09_rm         = Rojaria sunyeoneun neul gwichantaneun mareul ibe dalgo saljiman, eommue chungsilhae. Jinanbeone naega gwichaneumyeon naege doumeul cheonghara rago haja geuge deo gwichantago daedaphaesseo. Eum... yeoksi nan ajik bujokhae
|vo_08_09_tl         = Sister Rosaria always talks about being lazy, but she is faithful to her work. The last time I asked her to ask me for help if she were bothered by anything, she answered that it was more annoying to ask for help. Well... I'm still not good enough.

|vo_08_10_title      = 다이루크에 대해・마음의 빚
|vo_08_10_subtitle   = About [[Diluc]]: Disillusion
|vo_08_10_friendship = 4
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diluc - Disillusion.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = 다이루크 선배가 기사단을 비판하는 데엔 다 이유가 있어. 죄책감이 들어도 이미 정해진 결과를 바꾼 순 없지…. 난 나의 노력으로 기사단에 대한 선배의 관점을 바꾸고 싶어…. 응, 이건 내 책임이야
|vo_08_10_rm         = Dairukeu seonbaega gisadaneul bipanhaneun deen da iyuga isseo. Joechaekgami deureodo imi jeonghaejin gyeolgwareul bakkul sun eopjji... Nan na-ui noryeogeuro gisadane daehan seonbae-ui gwanjeomeul bakkugo sipeo... Eung, igeon nae chaegimiya
|vo_08_10_tl         = There are reasons as to why senior Diluc criticizes the Knights. Even though I feel guilty, I cannot change something that has already been determined... I want to change his perspective on the Knights with my own endeavor... Yes, it's my responsibility.

|vo_08_11_title      = 다이루크에 대해・존중
|vo_08_11_subtitle   = About Diluc: Respect
|vo_08_11_friendship = 4
|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diluc - Respect.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx         = 다이루크는… 정말 존경스러운 선배야. 우린 서로 다른 길을 선택했지만, 몬드를 지키고자 하는 목표만큼은 같아
|vo_08_11_rm         = Dairukeuneun... jeongmal jongyeongseuroun seonbaeya. Urin seoro dareun gireul seontaekhaetjiman, Mondeureul jikigoja haneun mokpyomankeumeun gata
|vo_08_11_tl         = Diluc... is a very respectable senior. We chose different paths, but the goal to protect Mondstadt is the same.

|vo_08_12_title      = 설탕에 대해…
|vo_08_12_subtitle   = About [[Sucrose]]
|vo_08_12_friendship = 4
|vo_08_12_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Sucrose.ogg
|vo_08_12_tx         = 그녀는 연금술사로서도 매우 남다른 재능이 있어. 게다가 곁에 있는 알베도의 지도를 받을 수 있으니 그녀의 미래는 걱정할 것 없겠지. 다만… 아, 아니야, 자기만의 세계에 잠겨있는 것도, 나쁜 것만은 아니겠지
|vo_08_12_rm         = Geunyeoneun yeongeumsulsaroseodo maeu namdareun jaeneung'i isseo. Gedaga gyeote itneun Albedo-ui jidoreul badeul su isseuni geunyeo-ui miraeneun geokjeonghal geot eopgetjji. Daman... a, aniya, jagiman-ui segyee jamgyeoitneun geotdo, nappeun geotmaneunanigetjji.
|vo_08_12_tl         = She has a very unique talent as an alchemist. Also, she can be taught by Albedo, so her future is nothing to worry about. However... ah, no, being locked in her own world mustn't be something that's always bad.

|vo_08_13_title      = 유라에 대해…
|vo_08_13_subtitle   = About [[Eula]]
|vo_08_13_friendship = 4
|vo_08_13_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Eula.ogg
|vo_08_13_tx         = 유라? 흠… 그녀의 신분을 너무 마음에 두지 마. 페보니우스 기사는 모든 사람을 공평하게 평가하니까. 유라는 사리 분별을 잘하고 뛰어난 재능이 있어. 가끔 위험한 발언을 하지만, 그건 그녀의 성격 때문이야. 그녀가 늘 내게 도전하겠다고 해도 난 개의치 않아
|vo_08_13_rm         = Yura? Heum... geunyeo-ui sinbuneul neomu maeume duji ma. Peboniuseu gisaneun modeun sarameul gongpyeonghage pyeonggahanikka. Yuraneun sari bunbyeoreul jalhago ttwieonan jaeneung'i isseo. Gakkeum wiheomham bareoneul hajiman, geugeon geunyeo-ui seonggyeok ttaemuniya. Geunyeoga neul naege dojeonhagetdago haedo nan gaeuichi ana
|vo_08_13_tl         = Eula? Hmm... don't take her position in mind. A Favonius Knight equally evaluates everyone. Eula is good at making sense, and she has astounding skills. Sometimes she makes dangerous comments, but it's because of her personality. I don't mind even though she says that she will challenge me.

|vo_08_14_title      = 미카에 대해…
|vo_08_14_friendship = 4
|vo_08_14_subtitle   = About [[Mika]]
|vo_08_14_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Mika.ogg
|vo_08_14_tx         = 대단장께서 미카를 원정대 사전 정찰의 핵심 대원으로 뽑으신 이유는 임무에 필요해서 그런 것도 있지만, 근면 성실한 그의 성격을 좋게 보셨기 때문이지. 개인적으로 나도 그런 동료와 함께 일할 수 있어서 영광이야
|vo_08_14_rm         = Daedanjangkkeseo Mikareul wonjeongdae sajeon jeongchal-ui haeksim daewoneuro ppobeusin iyuneun immue piryohaeseo geureon geotdo itjiman, geunmyeon seongsilhan geu-ui seonggyeogeul joke bosyeotgi ttaemuniji. Gaeinjeogeuro naeo geureon dongryowa hamkke ilhal su isseoseo yeonggwang'iya
|vo_08_14_tl         = The reason why the Grandmaster picked Mika as the expedition advance reconnaissance team's core member is because he is needed for the mission, but it is also because he saw his diligent personality well. Personally, it is an honor for me to work with a colleague like him as well.

|vo_09_01_title      = 진에 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 난 페보니우스 기사단의 신임과 몬드 사람들의 기대를 한 몸에 받고 있어. 그러니 해이해질 수 없어
|vo_09_01_rm         = Nan Peboniuseu gisadan-ui sinimgwa Mondeu saramdeul-ui gidaereul han mome batgo isseo. Geureoni haeihaejil su eopsseo
|vo_09_01_tl         = I have the trust of the Knights of Favonius and the expectations of the people of Mondstadt. Therefore, I can't relax.

|vo_09_02_title      = 진에 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 바네사의 「민들레 기사」 호칭은 지금까지 계승되고 있어. 예전에 수많은 위대한 기사들이 이 영예를 누렸지. 이 호칭에 걸맞게 난 절대 해이해질 수 없어. 난 모두를 지키는 수호의 방패와 검이 되어야 해
|vo_09_02_rm         = Banesa-ui "Mindeulle Gisa" hoching'eun jigeumkkaji gyeseungdoego isseo. Yejeone sumaneun widaehan gisadeuri i yeong'yereul nuryeotji. I hoching'e geolmatge nan jeoldae haeihaejil su eopsseo. Nan modureul jikineun suho-ui bangpaewa geomi doeeoya hae
|vo_09_02_tl         = Vanessa's title of "Dandelion Knight" has been inherited to this day. Many great knights once had this honor. I can never slacken up for this title. I need to be the shield and sword that protects everyone.

|vo_09_03_title      = 진에 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 전설이나 사서에는 기사의 위대한 공적만 기록되어 있지. 설마 그들은 한 번도 방황한 적이 없었던 건가…?<br />바람아, 내게 나아가야 할 길을 인도해줘
|vo_09_03_rm         = Jeonseorina saseoeneun gisa-ui widaehan gongjeokman girokdoeeo itji. Seolma geudeureun han beondo banghwanghan jeogi eopsseotdeon geonga...?<br />Barama, naege naagaya hal gireul indohaejwo
|vo_09_03_tl         = Legends and books record only the great achievements of Knights. Have they never wandered before...?<br />Wind, please guide me on my way.

|vo_09_04_title      = 진에 대해 알기・네 번째
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 일에 몰두하면 고민은 잊히고 시간은 빨리 가지. 「네가 이 일의 적임자야」…. 이게 그때 바르카 대단장님께서 내게 하신 말씀이야
|vo_09_04_rm         = Ire molduhamyeon gomineun itjigo siganeun ppalli gaji. "Nega i il-ui jeogimjaya"... Ige geuttae Bareuka daedanjangnimkkeseo naege hasin malsseumiya
|vo_09_04_tl         = When you're absorbed in your work, your worries are forgotten and time flies. "You're the right person for this job"... That's what Grandmaster Varka told me then.

|vo_09_05_title      = 진에 대해 알기・다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 너와 함께 있으면 길이 분명히 보여. 마치 의지할 수 있는 사람이 생긴 것처럼, 이건 대체…<br />아니, 내 노력이 부족해서 그래, 절대 해이해질 수 없어. 페보니우스 기사단과 몬드를 실망시킬 수 없지…. 그래도 고마워
|vo_09_05_rm         = Neowa hamkke isseumyeon giri bunmyeonghi boyeo. Machi uijihal su itneun sarami saenggin geotcheoreom, igeon daeche...<br />Ani, nae noryeogi bujokhaeseo geurae, jeoldae haeihaejil su eopsseo. Peboniuseu gisadangwa Mondeureul silmangsikil su eopjji... Geuraedo gomawo
|vo_09_05_tl         = I can see the path clearly when I'm with you. As if there's someone you can rely on, what is this...<br />No, it's just my lack of effort, I can never be relaxed. I can't disappoint the Knights of Favonius and Mondstadt... Thank you, though.

|vo_10_01_title      = 진의 취미…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 책 속의 영웅들 이야기를 같이 나눠도 될까? 음, 「켄리아의 영웅왕」의 이야기를 들어본 적이 있나?
|vo_10_01_rm         = Chaek sok-ui yeong'ungdeul iyagireul gachi nanwodo doelkka? Eum, "Kenria-ui Yeong'ung'wang"ui iyagireul deureobon jeogi itna?
|vo_10_01_tl         = May we talk about the heroes in books? Hmm, have you heard of the "Hero King of Khaenri'ah"?

|vo_10_02_title      = 진의 고민…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = 만약 잠을 안 자도 되는 신기한 포션이 있다면…. 음, 내일 리사에게 물어볼까?
|vo_10_02_rm         = Manyak jameul an jado doeneun singihan posyeoni itdamyeon... Eum, naeil Risaege mureobolkka?
|vo_10_02_tl         = If there is a miraculous potion that makes you not need of sleep... Hmm, may I ask Lisa tomorrow?

|vo_10_03_title      = 좋아하는 음식…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = 캣테일 술집의 피자…. 먹은 지 한참됐어, 사무실로 배달되면 좋을 텐데
|vo_10_03_rm         = Kaetteil suljip-ui pija... Meogeun ji hamchamdwaesseo, samusillo baedaldoemyeon joeul tende
|vo_10_03_tl         = The pizza from Cat's Tail... It's been a long while since I had it. It would be great if it could be delivered to my office.

|vo_10_04_title      = 싫어하는 음식…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = 우수한 기사는 편식하면 안 돼
|vo_10_04_rm         = Usuhan gisaneun pyeonsikhamyeon an dwae
|vo_10_04_tl         = An excellent Knight shouldn't eat only what they want.

<!-- Receiving a Gift -->
|vo_11_01_title      = 선물 획득・첫 번째
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = 맛도 괜찮고 몸에도 좋을 것 같아. 고생 많았어
|vo_11_01_rm         = Matdo gwaenchanko momedo joeul geot gata. Gosaeng manasseo
|vo_11_01_tl         = It has a decent taste, and it also seems good to our body. You've done a good job.

|vo_11_02_title      = 선물 획득・두 번째
|vo_11_02_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = 응, 먹으니까 훨씬 힘이 나네. 고마워
|vo_11_02_rm         = Eung, meogeunikka hwolssin himi nane. Gomawo
|vo_11_02_tl         = Mhm, I gain much strength after eating it. Thanks.

|vo_11_03_title      = 선물 획득・세 번째
|vo_11_03_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = 후… 어쨌든 수고 많았어
|vo_11_03_rm         = Hu... eojjaetdeun sugo manasseo
|vo_11_03_tl         = Phew... anyways, you did hard work.

|vo_12_01_title      = 생일…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = 오늘은 경축할 날이야. 왜냐하면 바람의 수호를 받는 네가 태어난 날이니까, 생일이니 오늘은 푹 쉬어.<br />흠흠… 생일 축하합니다….<br />아, 묻지도 않고 선물을 준비했네. 마음에 들어?
|vo_12_01_rm         = Oneureun gyeongchukhal nariya. Waenyahamyeon baram-ui suhoreul batneun nega taeeonan narinikka, saeng'irini oneureun puk swieo.<br />Heumheum... saeng'il chukhahapnida...<br />A, mutjido anko seonmureul junbihaetne. Maeume deureo?
|vo_12_01_tl         = Today is a day to celebrate. Because it's the day you were born under the protection of the wind, take a good rest today since it's your birthday.<br />Hmm... happy birthday to you... Oh, I prepared a present without asking. Do you like it?

|vo_13_01_title      = 돌파의 느낌・기
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = 좋아, 내친김에 다음 목표까지 나가지
|vo_13_01_rm         = Joa, naechingime daeum mokpyokkaji nagaji
|vo_13_01_tl         = Good, let's go to the next goal while we're at it.

|vo_13_02_title      = 돌파의 느낌・승
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = 바람이 그치치 않는다면 나도 절대 멈추지 않아
|vo_13_02_rm         = Barami geuchiji anneundamyeon nado jeoldae meomchuji ana
|vo_13_02_tl         = If the wind doesn't stop blowing, I'll never stop as well.

|vo_13_03_title      = 돌파의 느낌・전
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = 잠깐 평온해졌다고 안심하긴 일러. 난 단장 대행이니까 미리미리 준비해 둬야 해
|vo_13_03_rm         = Jamkkan pyeong'onhaejyeotdago ansimhagin illeo. Nan danjang daehaeng'inikka mirimiri junbihae dwoya hae
|vo_13_03_tl         = It's too early to relax just because peace has come for a while. I'm the Acting Grandmaster, so I should prepare things.

|vo_13_04_title      = 돌파의 느낌・결
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 난 아직 멀었어. 너와 만나고부터 줄곧 보살핌만 받았네….<br />바람아, 내 마음을 허락해줘.<br />단장 대행이 아닌 진으로서 이 자리에서 맹세할게. 내 검은 언제나 너와 함께 할 거야
|vo_13_04_rm         = Nan ajik meoreosseo. Neowa mannagobuteo julgot bosalpimman badatne...<br />Barama, nae maeumeul heorakhaejwo.<br />Danjang daehaeng'i anin Jineurosseo i jarieseo maengsehalkke. Nae geomeun eonjena neowa hamkke hal geoya
|vo_13_04_tl         = I'm still far away. Since I met you, I kept getting taken care of...<br />Wind, please allow my thoughts.<br />As Jean, not Acting Grandmaster, I will swear in this place. My sword will always be with you.
}}
